title: Iron troll
data:
***Version [0.25](/0.25 "0.25")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For a list of all trolls, see [list of trolls](/List_of_trolls "List of trolls").*

| iron troll T [![Iron troll.png](/images/6/68/Iron_troll.png)](/File:Iron_troll.png) |                                                                                                                                               |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                      | 58-118                                                                                                                                        |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                          | 16                                                                                                                                            |

| Attack1                                                                             | 35 ([bite](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                            |
| Attack2                                                                             | 25 ([claw](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                            |
| Attack3                                                                             | 25 ([claw](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                            |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                             | [rF+](/Fire "Fire") [rC+](/Cold "Cold")                                                                                                       |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                   | None                                                                                                                                          |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                                       | Land                                                                                                                                          |

| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                    | [Open doors](/Category:Open_doors "Category:Open doors")                                                                                      |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                                    | [Natural](/Category:Natural_holiness "Category:Natural holiness")                                                                             |
| [Size](/Size "Size")                                                                | [Large](/Category:Large_monsters "Category:Large monsters")                                                                                   |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A great troll, mighty of limb and plated with thick scales that resemble lightly rusted iron, especially in their hardness.***“Buckshank bold and Elfinstone, And more than I can mention here, They caused to be built so stout a ship, And unto Iceland they would steer. They launched the ship upon the main, Which bellowed like a wrathful bear; Down to the bottom the vessel sank, A laidly Trold has dragged it there.” -George Borrow, \_Lavengro: The Scholar, the Gypsy, the Priest\_. 1851. |

## Useful Info

**Iron trolls** are the largest and most exaggerated of the [trolls](/List_of_trolls "List of trolls"). Their metal flesh regenerates quickly, and they can both give and take the most abuse in combat. Fortunately, they move slowly, and apart from partial fire and ice resistance have no other distinguishing features.

## Tips & Tricks

- If you can comfortably melee a deep troll, you can probably manage one of these. Any ranged character should simply [kite](/Kite "Kite") it.
html:
Iron troll

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.25: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all trolls, see list of trolls.

iron troll T 
HP 58-118
HD 16
XP 776
Speed 7
AC 20
EV 4
Will 100
Attack1 35 (bite: plain)
Attack2 25 (claw: plain)
Attack3 25 (claw: plain)
Resistances rF+
rC+
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Large
Type troll, iron troll
Flags Regenerates
Speaks
Warm-blooded
A great troll, mighty of limb and plated with thick scales that resemble lightly rusted iron, especially in their hardness.

“Buckshank bold and Elfinstone,
And more than I can mention here,
They caused to be built so stout a ship,
And unto Iceland they would steer.

They launched the ship upon the main,
Which bellowed like a wrathful bear;
Down to the bottom the vessel sank,
A laidly Trold has dragged it there.”
-George Borrow, _Lavengro: The Scholar, the Gypsy, the Priest_. 1851.

Useful Info

Iron trolls are the largest and most exaggerated of the trolls. Their metal flesh regenerates quickly, and they can both give and take the most abuse in combat. Fortunately, they move slowly, and apart from partial fire and ice resistance have no other distinguishing features.

Tips & Tricks

  • If you can comfortably melee a deep troll, you can probably manage one of these. Any ranged character should simply kite it.
